name: unbeLEAFable
description:
Flora that floor's ya!

            

The Game

You're a mythical plant shopkeeper - keep your plants alive and find them happy homes! Use your green thumb to water and feed your mystical flora, while keeping up with customer requests. 

Beware - you'll get a new plant need or customer demand every 10 seconds. Time flies in this mythical greenhouse! Survive as long as possible before you hit 5 strikes.

Controls
  • WASD moves your character 
  • Left-click to interact with plants and items - feed, pick up, place.
  • Right-click to water plants and fill up your watering jug
Hints
  • Remember to fill up your water meter at the sink.
  • Find items for the plants at their relevant stations:
    • Gems are chipped off the giant glowing gem
    • Potions are found in the bookshelf
    • Meat is in the back meat-locker
    • Gold is in the back treasure chest
    • Insects are in the back terrarium 

            

Dev Notes

We had an amazing time of learning, ideating, and melding together as a team. We learned a lot, for example: mixing our various skills together to make a unique game style - 2d art with 3d programming - and we think it turned out great!

If we had more time, we would change the following...

  • Give better indications of where you need to go for certain items
  • Include a currency system so that customers pay the shopkeeper
  • Add in the watering cannister that the shopkeeper carries around
  • Finish adding UI elements for the timer and event counter
  • Polishing! More sound balancing, more knickknacks, etc.

All in all, our band of friends had a wonderful 72 hours of creating, designing, and building. Ready for the next one! ...after a nice long slumber.
